attributes.action: encourage the police and highways patrol to caution and/or charge people hogging the middle lane on motorways with careless driving, and to use overhead signs to encourage drivers to "KEEP LEFT"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is clear that a lot of motorway congestion is caused by motorway drivers sitting in the middle and right hand lanes when they should pull over to the left, allowing faster vehicles to pass. The Highway Code stipulates drivers should keep to the left; the motorways are patrolled by highways agency officers- surely they should encourage drivers to follow this, and other, parts of the Highway code.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
